website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you don't mind the high price and prefer a cleaner in a spay-bottle.
pros: Safe and effective for use on numerous surfaces for a variety of pet stains and odors
Has a pleasant scent and convenient spray nozzle
Backed by the company with a 100% satisfaction guarantee
cons: It's expensive, and you only get 32 oz
compared to the other top-sellers' gallon-sized jugs
May require several applications for tough stains and strong odors
Doesn't stop pets determined to mark

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: My dig King kept peeing at the same place every day for some time. I work nights and get home at 7am. The last thing I want to do is clean up dog urine. Before using this I cleaned the spot well, sprayed it with Paws and that was the last time I have cleaned up pee in the house. Has a strong smell for sure bit it's not bad and it definitely works. Excellent product that does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS !!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING !!! It truly works and works well. I have an older cat that has started urinating outside the litter box. Our house REEKED !!! I was embarrassed to have people over. I tried so many products that just didn't do the job. They would slightly mask the odor, but it was always there. With this, it's like we don't even own cats. I am not "wowed" very often. WOW !!! WORTH EVERY PENNY !!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Komp

customer_reviews.title: I must agree that our reactions to this "odor remover" were worse than the cause for using it
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping that the negative reviews about the perfumed chemical smells were written by hyper-sensitive folks, but sadly, I must agree that our reactions to this "odor remover" were worse than the cause for using it. I had a terrible allergic response to the smell, and it took 2 days of open windows (December in Maine - brrrrrrrrr!) to get the smell out of the living room. Guess you could say the product worked not only worked to deter our new critter from re-use of the spot, but our use of the entire room, too. Update: Vendor contacted me to offer full refund, and say they were working to reduce intense scent (as also noted by other customers).
customer_reviews.author: Sherri E.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: First, I don’t know why people complain about the scent. It’s not that bad, strong at first but disappears after dry. Besides would you rather smell pee and poop???? It cleans! I use on synthetic rugs, since the dogs ruin wool. My older Cocker Spaniel has gotten really bad at pooping in the house, especially when it rains all day. I pick up the poo and then spray the rug. After letting it stay for 5 or 10 min, I clean with a damp rag. No more stain. Or smell. I have tried lots of products but none work as well as this does.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo222324

customer_reviews.title: Stains and smell GONE!
customer_reviews.text: We have a fussy little Bichon that is perfectly house trained if she's not left alone. If we leave her by herself at the house free to roam, she demonstrates her annoyance with us by spite peeing/pooping. We tried about 6 different pet odor and stain removers before landing on "Particular Paws Pet Stain and Odor Remover". It sprays on, you let it sit for a few minutes and you wipe up the excess. You can no longer see any kind of stain or any outline from the spray either. The smell is clean and nice (although sometimes a bit strong). The treated spot has no odor left and our little dog never returns to a treated location.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne C. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as well as I had hoped. I have an 8 year old small 2 lb dog and I leave her inside while I'm at work. Well she doesn't hold it til I get home and likes a rug in my house. I clean the area then spray it with this spray and scrub again but you can still see the urine spots. I cleaned the rug with a professional rug doctor and it is so gross I'm just gonna get rid of the rug
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: I Hate the Smell of Cat Piss!
customer_reviews.text: The odor remover arrived right when it was supposed to. I was able to take it right out of the box & run it to the rooms where it was needed most. The two day free delivery was worth every penny. The bottle was thin enough to slide, unseen, between the Comet and the Shout, when we were done with it for the time being, & the bottle was large enough that we will be able to use it again & again.
customer_reviews.author: CaimanHunter

customer_reviews.title: No more dog smell - bravo!
customer_reviews.text: For years, my family found that traditional cleaning products are not safe [like those that contain bleach] and don't take care of the smell when our dog messes are cleaned from tile. We used to have to get scented candles and lots of other products to take care of the smell. This cleaner is AMAZING! My entire household agrees that dog smell is no longer an issue in the house. And, it doesn't keep my dog from going to the bathroom on her pad at her "chosen spot".
customer_reviews.author: AM Dew

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Litter Box Odors
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt think this stuff was going to work for litter box odor. The odor from the box was starting to become quite obvious even tho i clean it everyday. I ordered this stuff, sprayed it on the carpet under the litter box, placed litter box back in place and immediately no more odor. It last for about 3 weeks before you need another treatment but yeah it does an excellent job at killing litter box odor. The enzymes in this spray are so powerful, it even removed a bacon grease stain that had been in my carpet for several months!
customer_reviews.author: shadygrady0002

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my mattress that my cat peed on. It IMMEDIATELY removed the odor and left it smelling fresh. Also used on chairs that had set in cat pee, and it worked amazingly. Finally, I also sprayed on my floor where the cat may have peed as well, and it removed the smell. Works wonderfully! Don't buy anything else but this product if you have a cat with bad peeing behaviors. You wouldn't even know I ever had a cat after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: a.shar

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works like magic on pet stains and odors (cat and dog)
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works like magic on pet stains and odors (cat and dog). My only complaint is that I did not realize how strong of an odor the spray has, it does fade pretty quickly the initial "blast" set me to coughing for twenty minutes. Make sure area is well ventilated and my second use was with a protective dust mask (cheap, blue, found in paint isle at Lowes). I took a star for the coughing fit...otherwise really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Guy on a bike

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Works great. Our cat peed on our new futon and a pillow on our couch, which seeped into the couch. I used an entire bottle of a different product that I had used before, with no success. I tried the peroxide, dish soap and baking soda recipe on a small area of the futon. It worked, but lightened the futon color. So I researched on Amazon. This product had good reviews so I tried it. My stains were over a month old by now. It not only took the smell away, but it brought the color back into the futon.
customer_reviews.author: aschiede

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and irritates skin!
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong artificial scent which smells worse than urine. In addition, it caused skin irritation on my hands. Definitely gonna return it.
customer_reviews.author: YEZI

customer_reviews.title: Pee be gone !!
customer_reviews.text: While on vacation our cat urinated on the carpet in the corner of our bedroom, needless to say it did not smell very nice. I cleaned it twice with our steam cleaner..didn't help. I read the reviews for this product and ordered it. Soaked the area with it let it sit for an hour and sucked it up with the steam cleaner. The residual product did have a strong smell but dissapted after a day or so. In summary I am very happy with the results no more pee smell !!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. HOWARD

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, it has saved my house after I adopted a sickly young rescue dog. You are right about the illness factor, by the way. I couldn't figure out why she still has so many and frequent accidents, but she is recently diagnosed with a congenital liver issue that is contributing to the problem. My home smelled like a cesspool, and now it's​ fine. I got one bottle about a month ago, used it up and now have two more.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat how the odor remover actually works. As silly as that sounds I really didn't expect it to work. I've used Resolve my entire life of 36 years on carpet stains so the scent of that product instantly reminds me of pet odor. When my big dog had an accident in my brand new theater room I wanted to find something that would allow me to feel like my room wasn't ruined. The reviews helped me pick this product and I'm sure glad I did. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Our dog-loving home is a HUGE fan of this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a Godsend! We recently buried our 13 year old lab, who was prone to accidents in his last year, and have adopted 2 rescues within the past year, so training continues to be an issue! We are thankful for this product that works so well to eliminate ALL odors and helps us feel like our home is clean whatever the dogs throw at it!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Got the oxy version and still doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good product. It works on new stains but you have to saturate the area til it’s soaking wet. And repeat. On old stains it takes spraying seeply about 5 Times. See Spot Go was the best product for this but it’s not made anymore. I’ve tried this product twice and I want a refund. Costs too much to work a little. It lightens the stain. Doesn’t remove it
customer_reviews.author: laura adams

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for this
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new house, and my anxious cat has been peeing outside of the litter box on the carpet. (Yes, she's been checked by the vet for a UTI). The odor of cat urine is so strong, and I was starting to think I wouldn't be able to invite people over anymore. I just used it for the first time today, and it really neutralized the odor. Looking forward to seeing how well it eliminates the stain.
customer_reviews.author: RachelB

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having accidents, on the carpet, for about a week when I decided to give this a try. After cleaning the area with a vinegar solution, and soaking the area with the spray overnight, I used a carpet cleaner to get rid of the extra liquid. I let the area dry, and the smell remained...I repeated the process 2 more times, and Still a light smell remained. I ended up using a different product to get rid of the last of the smell. I'm rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and does not work
customer_reviews.text: I've used many carpet cleaners and thought I'd give this a try because of its high rating. I tried multiple applications of the product onto the stain and let it soak for a few hours every time. However, each time I used a towel to blot, the stain was not removed at all and did not get pulled into the towel. I will be sticking with the $5 pet stain carpet cleaner from the local Target instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fang

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although the product didn't work well on my carpet to remove pet stain- the customer service is outstanding. They gave me a full refund without me asking for one! This company gives 100% customer satisfaction and that is worth more than I can say. The product removed the odor fine- but left the stain- that may be because of the type of carpet I have - I don't know. I do know that you should give it a try for they stand behind their product so you have nothing to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a sticky residue behind
customer_reviews.text: This is impossible to get off of the floor once you've used it. It seems to continue bubbling no matter how many times I go over it with a wet cloth, which is unfortunate because it leaves a terrible sticky residue on the floor. I found myself not wanting to use it where my puppy could accidentally ingest it, especially in her kennel. I would not purchase this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.R

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product twice. The first time was to help with urine stains from a rough go at potty training. The second bottle was purchased after my older dog had an upset stomach and stained the carpet unexpected. As soon as I seen the mess I cleaned it up and steam cleaned the carpet but there was still a brown stain clear to the eye. Well it is GONE tonight. Fantastic product I would buy it by the gallon. I might actually try putting it in my steam cleaner and giving it a whirl!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent
customer_reviews.text: This product may work to eliminate the pet waste odors, but the scent that remains is awful. It smells like awful air freshener and it stays around for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: There is no miracle for urine, sadly.
customer_reviews.text: My cat, and then my Chihuahua, urinated on a unique rug. Rough night here. I panicked. Figured this was worth a shot, and had it sent overnight. I followed its directions. Stains did not come out (tried 3 times letting it soak per directions) from the ivory-base rug, but urine scent seemed removed/masked. I thought. But the dog gravitated to it and peed all over it again. I wasted $28 and the rug is in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Removed pet odor but very strong after-smell!
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to do the job. My dog had a urine accident all over a portion of my sofa and after a few attempts of trying to eliminate the odor via vinegar and baking soda, I knew I needed something much stronger. So I purchased this product. The product definitely removed the urine odor, however, the smell is so, so, so strong, that it gave me a headache. This could be because I may be more sensitive to smells than others.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stinks. Strong fragrance smell. Not sure if it removes or masks smell. Heard read on msds that most products are alcohol or peroxide based with a fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the smell. And the spray tube is too short. The spray stopped working when there was still alot of solution left in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: custard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is best odor eliminator I have ever used. It is expensive compared to others but well worth it. I had an old cat that urinated on my new loveseat. Nothing worked until I used Paws odor eliminator. The couch smelled fresh and no more horrible cat urine smell at all. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The smell was strong for a few days. Like a chemical smell. But once it dried, I didn't smell the urine any longer. I used the product as the instructions stated and it worked great. I've noticed my dog doesn't go in that area at all. I'm wondering is the smell like a repellant for him. Would recommend this product to anyone withat pet stains.
customer_reviews.author: IamNee

customer_reviews.title: Particular Paws Pet Stain and Odor Remover
customer_reviews.text: We have been fighting our cat urinating on our stairway. This has been going on for 1 1/2 months. Due to the longevity of the problem it too several treatments to eliminate the odor issue. The product does have an odd odor when first applied, but dissipated quickly. We are very pleased with the product and effectiveness. We are now odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Mary50

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet odor remover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff I have found yet... the oder is strong at first when spraying , but dissipates fast and removes pet odor... love this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This works and removes the stains and smell immediately. I just ordered two more Bottles. I have tried many carpet cleaners but take my word for it, this is the best. You will love the pleasant smell as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ava515

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good at first, but not sure it is doing the whole job.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to clean up after our indoor piglet's accidents. At first I was really happy about how it sprayed. We've had trouble with other products spraying too weak/strong a stream, both make it hard to saturate the carpet. It cleans spots perfectly out of a white carpet. The 3 stars are because I'm not sure it has done the job. Our piglet has repeated accidents in the same spot after following all the instructions on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dana T

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well to keep our cat from peeing on the kitchen floor. The smell isn’t super strong, but definitely a smell. BUT, at least it doesn’t smell like cat pee! The cats still went over there, but it killed the smell, so no more peeing.
customer_reviews.author: D Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the spray for 4 weeks with my puppy. It works good!!! Unfortunately, my puppy hasn’t caught on to the potty outside concept so I’ve gotten a 2nd bottle!! Hoping i don’t need a 3rd but will happily get it as it helps not to potty in the previous spots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 5 stars except I think it's quite expensive. That said it has a lasting fragrance and does get rid of both cat and dog urine stains and odor. This is my second order after my cat got closed in my extra room for a few days before my house sitter noticed he was missing. It worked on the carpet AND the mattress. That was not a fun discovery 😭
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeanne Kane

customer_reviews.title: UNUSABLE SPRAY BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT COME WITH THE SPRAY NOZZLE!! I am unsure how this will be a useful product to me until I can go to the store and buy a spray bottle for an item I ALREADY paid $20 for!!! Kind of crazy if you ask me. For that reason, I am giving it two stars simply because it is unusable upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: BUDSBARANDGRILL

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure your product is working. It also has a great odor. We have only used a a few times as our male cat has issues with uti and making in a few areas . So far so good . I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Finally got rid of the cat pee smell!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a variety of products and remedies, finally this one got rid of the cat pee smell in our bedroom! However, it has a strong perfume smell that lingers for a very long time. I know it will fade eventually, and it's certainly better than the smell of cat pee.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Pet Stain and Odor Remover
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough positive things about this product! I’ve had dogs my entire life and sometimes accidents do happen. This product is absolutely remarkable. When used as directed it removes the worse stains and truly eliminates the resulting odor. My sister just got a puppy so I promptly ordered her a bottle of this amazing product! It really does work and is by far the best on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Petrakis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: i have pee pads on ahardwood floor that are changed every day or two . I love the way this stuff cleans and smells !
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Fox

customer_reviews.title: Extra Strong Scent - May Damage Sinuses
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps a great product to some, but the overpowering scent cause me to develop a bronchial condition. Switched back to Nature's Miracle.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Bigio

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: No better than any other similar products. It will not prevent a cat from doing its business unless you take care of the underlying issues (health, litter cleanliness, etc.). I for on cannot stand the smell of this product. At first it seems nice, but then it permeates and builds in smell and makes me gag. I will not be re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: BLUE ELEPHANT

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great!!! Ordered it after I tried all the home remedies I could find on the internet but my carpet still smelled like dog urine, not after using this just one time. And since I didn't order it until after my bad dog had made his mess it was a few days that my carpet had been smelly and this worked right away! Thank you:)
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Trundy

customer_reviews.title: It smells horrible - and the scent lingers
customer_reviews.text: It's bad when you feel like you almost liked the smell of the room more before than after. The smell is still heavy a week later -- and the urine detecting flashlight still detects stains.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: the couch smelled like a litter box
customer_reviews.text: I never fill these things out. We recently got a new kitten which infuriated our adult male who set out to punish us by peeing into the corner of the upholstered couch. As you might guess, the couch smelled like a litter box. In desperation I took a dubious chance on this product and I'll be damned if it didn't completely eliminate the odor after only 2 applications. - I mean totally gone. I'm so pleased to be able to write this, as the couch really stank. Buy this with confidence. I am both surprised and delighted by this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Lampert

customer_reviews.title: Great pet oder spray
customer_reviews.text: Great pet oder spray. Our dog went through a bout of incontinence and we were using this spray daily. Similar priced to other pet odor sprays and works great. Highly recommend for any pet stains or odors. If you have a pet, you need to have this spray in your cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Maly123Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, used it only a couple weeks and my dog stopped peeing in the carpet spot he decided to pee on for the past couple of months
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Eradicates odor
customer_reviews.text: My experience? Nothing works better! We have an aging German Shepard whose beginning to have accidents in the house. This product does the trick. It erases all odor the minute you spray it. My only wish is that they made it in large containers so I could use it to mop my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hedtke

customer_reviews.title: So far kitty has not re-marked the spot.
customer_reviews.text: My older kitty decided to advertise his dislike of his high sided litter box..(that took some time to figure out)by marking a spot in my closet. We have wood floors so I was unsure if this would work. Sprayed it on let it sit for a few minutes. It's been a month and he has not gone again. Thumbs up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it advertises!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product as we have a 16 year old dog who has accidents. This product really cleans and deodorizes!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. Does not mask the smell of pet odor and unable to remove stain even 5 minutes after my dog's accident. Would not purchase this product again and had to purchase a different product to clean my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Beachpartyof2

customer_reviews.title: Only okay
customer_reviews.text: Not the best odor and stain remove I have used for dog urine. This one still leaves some of the stain and the smell is not completely gone. I used it on old and new stains, with a towel and with a carpet cleaner. Not very impressed. I will keep it on hand as a back up but would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: HeartReviews

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for what we used it for cat pissed on our couch so we tried to clean it out did not work through the couch away
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works infinitely better than other brands I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Works infinitely better than other brands I've tried. Our cat has had a habit lately of marking little spots around her kitty tower as a feline middle-finger towards our two more rambunctious dogs. This helps eliminate any odor.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This spray does an excellent job of removing odors for humans
customer_reviews.text: This spray does an excellent job of removing odors for humans, but it still leaves trace urine in the affected area. I spray it on solid surfaces where my dog urinates, wait 5+ minutes, and repeat the process another time. But, my dog will still return to the scene to pee in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have an aging Shih Tsu and she has asthma and a collapsing trachea. Occasionally when coughing, she either vomit or "leaks". I bought this product to use when that happens. I also use it when washing her bedding. We are delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie F.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best odor remover I've ever used. Really helped remove the cat pee smell from my bed. I was thinking I might have to get a new bed, so I would highly recommend this product. Not only that, but the manufacturer emailed me to let me know that if I had an issue I could return the product for a full refund. I was highly impressed with their customer service and their product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Just Plain Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just plain works and works very well. My older Alaskan Mal does have 'issues' from time to time and weighing 112 pounds when she makes a mistake it is a big one. Thankfully this product really was able to clean up and remove the odor!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Was

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The whole house now smells like crappy dog shampoo... save your money ... will...not be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Ruzbeh T.

customer_reviews.title: My carpet def looks better, but didnt take out the yellow 100% maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on newer stains, also sprayed some on my sheepskin rug with pee stains, and completely took out the yellow for the most part! My carpet def looks better, but didnt take out the yellow 100% maybe 80%. But still works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, really works
customer_reviews.text: Love it, really helps with my kitty soiling when we moved. Really cleans well and absorbs every smell
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Long process
customer_reviews.text: Involves long process of: 1. Blot up urine (this I would expect with any cleaner) 2. Pour 6-8 ox of fresh water Soak or vacuum up (again not unreasonable) 3. Repeat step 2 two to three times (So I am really cleaning with water) 4. spray liberally and soak or vacuum up again (so I am soaking up or vacuuming up 5-6 times)
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lang

customer_reviews.title: Personally I had a really bad experience, I used the product as indicated in ... they returned my money
customer_reviews.text: Personally I had a really bad experience, I used the product as indicated in 2 rugs and both got stained and decolorated. Couldn't fix it had to get rid of one., I am changing my review as the company as soon as they saw it, they \contacted me, they return my money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, but too strongly fragranced. Will not continue use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so heavily perfumed it is practically unusable indoors. It takes weeks for the scent to fade, and is actually worse in my opinion than the smell it's "cleaning." I'm historically a fan of enzymatic cleaners, and have used a variety over the years to clean pet accidents on carpets. I have discarded the remaining product and will be looking elsewhere in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have had it before, now have a new fur friend and potty training is a little harder. This takes away the odor and leaves no stain.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Did a great job at removing cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Did a great job at removing cat urine from our rug. Just follow the manufacturers instructions, and you'll be happy too.
customer_reviews.author: NC Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for your pet stained carpet!!
customer_reviews.text: I have done everything to try to take the awful urine smell out of my carpet thanks to my rescue Chihuahua mix dog lol . This is the only product that has worked. It's safe for animals and I believe it is also not tested on animals. If your looking for a miracle for your carpet this is it. It's kind of pricey but it's WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I have been cleaning up after my disabled daughter’s very old cat who has mistakes almost every day. This stain remover works very well. It has a fresh scent and picks up the mess and even the stain comes clean. I have re-ordered this product several times. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ashrafi

customer_reviews.title: Effective product both stain and smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is potent! Works well at eliminating both dog poo and pee stains. Strong enzyme odor neutralizes any remnants of the smell for good. This is a life saver when trying to potty train a puppy! Had some issues with the sprayer not working due to some of the product clumping but the other bottles and sprayers worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too much perfume smell. I had to air out my house for a couple days after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Paws!!
customer_reviews.text: Forget those frangrancy sprays and powders that don't do 100% of the job! This does 110% of the job -- breaking down the enzymes so there is never any returning odor.
customer_reviews.author: VirginiaC

customer_reviews.title: After a double swipe I could no longer smell the ...
customer_reviews.text: After a double swipe I could no longer smell the affending odor. Also it seemed all gone. Why then under certain light conditions does the stain still show its self. Let's say, I'm not sure of the affectiveness but it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Child

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and reeks, find something else.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product as directed, for over 2 months now, and not only it does nothing to discourage my cat from peeing in improper spots, it smells absolutely horrible. Comparing that lingering, nauseating stench with the smell of cat pee, I am not sure what’s worse. So it doesn’t work and it reeks, so don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Iness Ka

customer_reviews.title: it doesn’t have any bad odor. It works amazing
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. My puppy is just 7 weeks old and I’m potty training him but still pee in the carpet. When I spry it, it doesn’t have any bad odor. It works amazing. I’m definitely getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Maria N.

customer_reviews.title: Pet Stain and Odor Remover saved my carpet!
customer_reviews.text: My dog came home from grooming and had diarrhea all over our light carpet. Pet Stain and Odor Remover saved my carpet. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: This one works!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several other enzyme-based carpet cleaners for dog urine, this one has actually removed the lingering smell. Very happy with the effectiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Kayaram

customer_reviews.title: it is a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, it is a waste of time, even following the directions on the bottle does not work. I was NOT paid to try this product!
customer_reviews.author: j lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our wood floors. Does not leave any dullness.
customer_reviews.author: GINA KEITZ

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time and the product worked as described. Dark stains were considerable lightened (I have a beige carpet) and odor was completely eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for training
customer_reviews.text: Haven't needed for stain removal, but does remove odour and the dog doesn't gravitate to the same spots to relieve himself.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kimper

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought. I really love this stuff, and it works extremely well. I got a stain out of my carpet that I had given up on.
customer_reviews.author: nancy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works on stains but the product's scent is overwhelming!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for getting stains out of my hardwood floor after a few applications, but the added fragrance is very strong and persistent! I even tried washing my floor with soap and water afterwards but the smell is still there. I didn't want to give a terrible review because this product actually did what I bought it to do, but an unscented version would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Norm Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this stuff. It removes any visible staining immediately and after a couple treatments the odors appear to be completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: Works ok. Doesn't get rid of the smell permanently ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Doesn't get rid of the smell permanently, but is a temporary solution for in between carpet shampooing. It does have a strong smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Corona

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have used
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on pee, puke and poop. We have cats and dogs and someone is always leaving something on the carpet. Best product I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that gets rid of cat urine odor!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and smells pleasant. The initial smell after using it is a bit strong, so if you have folks at home with sensitive noses, asthma etc. (like us) then you'll want to put a fan on and leave a window open until it has dried and aired out a bit. But as far as ridding my home office of cat urine odor--I rate it an A Plus!! I had tried other stuff--vinegar, "natural" cleanser with tea tree oil, carpet foam spray--none of that worked. In fact the vinegar made it worse--smelled sour. My wife says I used too much--she's probably right. Anyway, this spray got rid of all that smell. I'm very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: A. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Uh oh
customer_reviews.text: Dog peed the night before guests were to eat in the dinning room. Treated the rug 24 hours prior to dinner and not one guest noticed that the dog had an accident. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this a 3 because the handle broke the very first time I used it... ugh..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the product itself is almost as bad as the cat urine I use it on, but at least it goes away after a bit! Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as advertised. Vinegar and water works better for us
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueleena

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i love that this does work and leaves a fresh scent, not chemically .no more cat urine smell for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: "It worked as the directions said!!! The cleaner has a VERY pleasant odor"
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Pike

customer_reviews.title: Works first time, every time
customer_reviews.text: Removes all cat and dog pee from everything. Utter magic. A real boom for people who have poor hygiene as well. NJow my clothes smell fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McCown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I had both old and new pet stains and it worked exactly as described on the bottle. I have tried many other cleaning products for my carpets and this is by far the best one. Older stains take a little more effort but I'm definitely pleased with the results. Thank you for your product...it's a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Micheline

customer_reviews.title: No more odor
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and they use the carpet for all their messes. The spray had a pleasant scent and seems to keep the odors away. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Glitter Pen Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Got the smell of cat urine out of my vehicle. I had used everything and nothing had worked. This product took care of the odor. Would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron & Krissy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My kitty doesn't mind the smell but he'll ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My kitty doesn't mind the smell but he'll do his best to go around the area and head back to his litter tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

product_meta.title: Particular Paws Pet Stain and Odor Remover - Professional Strength Triple Action Enzyme Spray Eliminates Dog and Cat Urine Stains and Smells - 32 oz
product_meta.description:
Safely & effectively eliminates pet stain causing odors!

Triple action, bio-enzyme cleaner erases new & old stains, eliminates odors, plus discourages re-soiling.

This professional strength formula starts working immediately by attacking the odor causing bacteria and gases found in pet stains. Bio-enzymes and stain fighting bacteria target the source, eliminating the soiled spot in addition to odor.

Tough organic stains like pet urine, feces or vomit are no problem for the Pet Stain and Odor Remover. Effectively removes stains and odors using an eco-friendly formula that’s tough on stains, not your furniture. The scent marks the spot! No more odor means your pet can’t retrace his steps to his designated soiling spot.

Approved by the Carpet and Rug Institute

Our Stain & Odor Eliminator has sustained rigorous testing and has proven to clean the toughest stains, from carpet and rugs, safely & effectively.

Not Your Average Stain and Odor Remover! Our triple enzyme stain and odor removing formula is different than others:

 * Bio-enzyme formula completely removes stains & eliminates odors
 * Environmentally friendly & free from harsh chemicals
 * Safe for use around the entire family
 * Effectively cleans furniture, carpet, hardwood floors, tiles, rugs, pet bedding, litter boxes, crates, cages, & cars
 * Neutralizes odors, leaving a fresh, clean scent

Manufacturer's 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

Made in the USA to meet the highest quality standards. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, please contact us for a hassle-free refund. No questions asked! Our #1 priority is to make sure you and your furry friend are completely happy!

Order NOW to restore your home and belongings to their pre-stain beauty!
feature_bullets: GET RID OF STAINS OLD AND NEW: Our formula is professional strength, triple action and contains Bio-Enzymes along with helpful bacteria to effectively neutralize odors and get rid of the toughest stains. The Bio-enzymes break up the tiny particles of the stain which is then consumed by the bacteria. Once the waste material is gone, the bacteria die. Our formula will fight all organic stains including urine vomit and feces.

ODOR ELIMINATION: Pet stains contain ammonia, stomach acid, and gut flora that give stains their highly unpleasant aroma. Unlike other deodorizers that would just mask the stench, our formula completely eliminates odors by actually removing the source of the odor.
DETER RE-SOILING: Like humans, pets designate an area for all their bathroom needs. Dogs and cats use scent to find this location in the house. No scent means no re-soiling.

TOTALLY SAFE: Our environmentally friendly pet stain and odor remover can be administered anywhere. There are no harmful smells. You will not need any special equipment to use. You can use around the entire family and all of your pets.

MANUFACTURER’S 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Made in the USA to meet the highest quality standards. If you are unsatisfied for any reason, please contact us for a hassle-free refund. Our #1 priority is to make sure you and your furry friend are completely happy with our product!
